effects.title: Hover Color Fade
effects.css: .hover-text1 { transition: color 0.4s ease; cursor: pointer; font-size: 18px; } .hover-text1:hover { color: #ff5722; }

effects.title: Button Background Fade
effects.css: .hover-btn1 { background-color: #6200ea; color: white; padding: 12px 24px; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 16px; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } .hover-btn1:hover { background-color: #3700b3; }

effects.title: Bounce Text
effects.css: @keyframes bounce { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px); } } .bounce { animation: bounce 1s infinite; }

effects.title: Pulse Button
